Funds are transferred from the Operation and Maintenance, Air Force, 23/23, appropriation (SAG 012A) to the Other Procurement, Air Force, 23/25, appropriation for proper execution of acquisitions of Mission Partner Environment operational nodes. This item is designated for centralized item management and asset control and, it has a unit cost in excess of the expense and investment dollar threshold of $350,000. This action does not change the purpose for which the funds were originally appropriated.
